meanings.definition: The quality or state of being loutish.
meanings.sent1: His loutishnesses were evident in the way he slouched and spoke loudly.
meanings.sent2: Her loutishnesses made her stand out in the refined crowd.
meanings.sent3: The loutishnesses of the clown at the party brought laughter to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The loutishnesses of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The loutishnesses of the bear startled the hikers in the woods.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions characteristic of a lout.
meanings.sent1: Avoid his loutishnesses if you want a peaceful evening.
meanings.sent2: The loutishnesses of the bully were finally addressed by the school authorities.
meanings.sent3: Despite his loutishnesses, he had a kind heart underneath.
meanings.sent4: The loutishnesses of the car driver angered other commuters on the road.
meanings.sent5: Her loutishnesses at the dinner table embarrassed her family.

meanings.definition: The rude or uncouth behavior exhibited by a lout.
meanings.sent1: His loutishnesses were a constant source of annoyance to his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The loutishnesses of the guest disrupted the harmony of the party.
meanings.sent3: Despite his loutishnesses, he managed to charm his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The loutishnesses of the customer made the waiter's job difficult.
meanings.sent5: Her loutishnesses in public places drew disapproving glances from others.
